title: Riot, from 1 to 10 how comfortable are you with profanity?

replies.body:
11, now y dont you ***  *** you *** *** right up your *** ***

edit: y is the asterisk not working?

**The actual answer: **We are comfortable with whatever the majority our community decides. If the players who would quit by people using profanity are greater than those who use it which would therefore decrease our game population -- we would rather have it gone.

Not sure what you expect after all it is a business. If you're causing them to lose more money than you can generate, they do not want you in their game.

> [{quoted}](name=Kaioko,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1741u7eZ,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-02-15T23:03:56.204+0000)
>
> **The actual answer: **We are comfortable with whatever the majority our community decides. If the players who would quit by people using profanity are greater than those who use it which would therefore decrease our game population -- we would rather have it gone.
> 
> Not sure what you expect after all it is a business. If you're causing them to lose more money than you can generate, they do not want you in their game.

o oki
0 even though its a teen game and teens are one of the only age groups that overly say profanities and hit people in the places where it hurts the most with their words.
